titulo: This puzzle game challenges you to tell a family’s story through organising photo albums and creating scrapbooks
descricao: Piece by piece you can pull this story together.

titulo: Cozy foraging game Out and About shares a new trailer as part of the Wholesome Direct, and there's a playtest you can take part in right now
descricao: NewsIn case you don't trust your own instincts, let this game guide you.

titulo: Balatro meets breakfast? This 'chaotic cooking roguelike' where you make omelets for picky customers and try not to enrage a giant chicken just launched on Steam
descricao: NewsStrategically stack ingredients to please hungry diners in Omelet You Cook.

titulo: If you like PowerWash Simulator, you might like this new game about blowing leaves
descricao: newsA demo for Leaf Blowing Co. is playable now on Steam.

titulo: I'm quitting PC Gamer to run a vending machine empire in the back streets of Japan after my idle game obsession shadow-dropped at the Wholesome Direct
descricao: NewsSometimes you just have to abandon your day job for something new.

titulo: Haunted Paws lets you and a friend navigate a haunted house as two dogs trying to find their missing human friend
descricao: NewsSounds cute, can't guarantee it won't be terrifying though.

titulo: Stress-free city builder Gourdlets is getting a 'fully-featured' multiplayer spin-off sometime this year
descricao: NewsGourdlets Together means you can enjoy the easygoing sandbox with pals.

titulo: Criminally underappreciated survival game Abiotic Factor is leaving early access with an update that adds buildable office cubicles and a spooky library
descricao: NewsThe final early access chapter launches this summer.

titulo: Forever Skies developer responds to 'significant' disappointment with the survival game's launch: 'It's tough to see that the game didn't meet the expectation of so many players'
descricao: News"Good or bad, our intention has never been to walk away".
